archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.3.4f: f) meet legal and regulatory requirements (e.g. those relating to privacy, data protection, data portability, cryptographic technologies, data breach notification and PCI DSS)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
